name: LockButtonWidgetHelper
description: The LockButtonWidgetHelper class is a specialized button widget in JSMacros that represents a lock button with toggle functionality.
overview:
The `LockButtonWidgetHelper` provides a complete lock button solution with:

- **Toggle Functionality**: Built-in locked/unlocked state management
- **Visual Feedback**: Different icons/appearances for locked and unlocked states
- **State Persistence**: The lock state can be programmatically controlled and queried
- **Full Button Features**: Inherits all standard button capabilities (positioning, actions, tooltips, etc.)
- **Builder Support**: Includes `LockButtonBuilder` for fluent widget creation
- **Screen Integration**: Works seamlessly with JSMacros custom screens

constructors.description: Creates a new lock button helper from an existing Minecraft lock button widget.

parameters.name: button
parameters.description: The underlying Minecraft lock button widget

constructors.description: Creates a new lock button helper with a specific z-index for render ordering.

parameters.name: button
parameters.description: The underlying Minecraft lock button widget

parameters.name: zIndex
parameters.description: The z-index value for render ordering

methods.name: isLocked
methods.description: Gets the current lock state of the button. Returns true if the button is currently locked, false otherwise.

methods.name: setLocked
methods.description: Sets the lock state of the button and updates its visual appearance.

parameters.name: locked
parameters.description: true to lock the button, false to unlock it

name: LockButtonBuilder
description: The LockButtonBuilder class is a specialized builder for creating lock button widgets with toggle functionality.
overview: The `LockButtonBuilder` provides a fluent, chainable API for configuring lock buttons with customizable initial states, actions, positioning, and appearance. This builder is the recommended way to create lock buttons for custom screens.

constructors.description: Creates a new LockButtonBuilder for the specified screen.

parameters.name: screen
parameters.description: The screen to add the lock button to

methods.name: isLocked
methods.description: Gets the initial lock state that has been configured for the button being built.

methods.name: locked
methods.description: Sets the initial lock state of the button when it is created. This determines whether the button starts in locked or unlocked state.

parameters.name: locked
parameters.description: Initial lock state (true for locked, false for unlocked)

methods.name: getAction
methods.description: Gets the click action that has been configured for the button being built.

methods.name: action
methods.description: Sets the click action for the lock button. The action receives the lock button helper and screen as parameters. Pass null to remove any existing action.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to execute when the button is clicked
